response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I am excited to offer you our premium product, which is tailored to meet your specific needs and expectations. This exceptional item has been meticulously designed and crafted to provide unparalleled performance and value. Given its unique features and capabilities, we believe it would be an invaluable addition to your collection or operations. For this extraordinary opportunity, I am extending an exclusive offer of $18,000. This price reflects not only the product's inherent value but also the commitment we have towards ensuring customer satisfaction. I look forward to your positive response and the possibility of enhancing your experience with our product.", "product_price": 18000}
